-class Calculadora:%0A%0A    def __init__(self, batteryMax: int = 0):%0A        self.battery: float = 0%0A        self.batteryMax: int = batteryMax%0A        self.display: float = 0%0A%0A    def __str__(self) -%3E str:%0A        return(f'display = %7Bself.display:.2f%7D, battery = %7Bself.battery%7D')%0A    %0A    def charge(self, increment: int):%0A        self.battery += increment%0A        if self.battery %3E self.batteryMax:%0A            self.battery = self.batteryMax%0A%0A    def useBattery(self) -%3E bool:%0A        if self.battery == 0:%0A            print('fail: bateria insuficiente')%0A            return False%0A        self.battery -= 1%0A        return True%0A%0A    def sum(self, a: int, b: int):%0A        if not self.useBattery():%0A            return%0A        self.display = a + b%0A%0A    def div(self, a: int, b: int):%0A        if not self.useBattery():%0A            return%0A        if b == 0:%0A            print('fail: divisao por zero')%0A            return%0A        self.display = a / b%0A%0A%0Adef main():%0A    calculadora = Calculadora()%0A    while True:%0A        line: str = input()%0A        print(f'$%7Bline%7D', end='%5Cn')%0A        args: list%5Bstr%5D = line.split(' ')%0A%0A        if args%5B0%5D == 'end':%0A            break%0A        elif args%5B0%5D == 'init':%0A            baterryMax = int(args%5B1%5D)%0A            calculadora = Calculadora(baterryMax)%0A        elif args %5B0%5D == 'show':%0A            print(calculadora)%0A        elif args%5B0%5D == 'charge':%0A            inc = int(args%5B1%5D)%0A            calculadora.charge(inc)%0A        elif args%5B0%5D == 'sum':%0A            a = int(args%5B1%5D)%0A            b = int(args%5B2%5D)%0A            calculadora.sum(a, b)%0A        elif args%5B0%5D == 'div':%0A            a = int(args%5B1%5D)%0A            b = int(args%5B2%5D)%0A            calculadora.div(a, b)%0A        else:%0A            print('fail: comando invalido')%0A%0Amain()
